description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Enjoy fast button mashing fun. Blowmind Games and Portal Games brings you "Speed Factory" an HD music game that is true to its roots. Play with a friend or against the computer. The computer has three intensities levels and the game has 4 different music levels, 12 different themes and secret themes and levels that you can unlock!
